data.meta_description: Through the generosity and support of our families, St. Peter School is blessed to offer financial assistance to those families having unexpected financial difficulty or might not otherwise be able...
data.text:
WELCOME TO ST. PETER SCHOOL

​NEW FAMILY SCHOOL ENROLLMENT

FOR 2024-2025

Registration for new families for the 2024-25 school year is NOW OPEN!

To access the ONLINE APPLICATION LINK, click here.

NOTE: Application and registration is a two step process. For a complete outline of these steps, download the file below. NOTE: During the enrollment step, you will need our District Code: STPR-IL.

FACTS Registration and Enrollment Steps 2024-25.pdfFile Size: 74 kbFile Type: pdf

Download File
